requirement: This code is intended to implement the registration of elevator call requests for four floors by updating a target floor array based on input call signals.
provide_code:
FUNCTION F_RegisterCalls
VAR_INPUT
	CallGround		:	BOOL;		// 0楼呼叫
	CallFloor1		:	BOOL;		// 1楼呼叫
	CallFloor2		:	BOOL;		// 2楼呼叫
	CallFloor3		:	BOOL;		// 3楼呼叫
END_VAR
VAR_IN_OUT
	TargetFloors	:	ARRAY[0..3] OF BOOL;	// 目标楼层数组
END_VAR
